name: AmbientNoise
0:
”Alexa, open Ambient Noise”
”Alexa, ask Ambient Noise for thunderstorms”
”Alexa, ask Ambient Noise for a list”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ambient noise
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Ambient Noise plays sleep sounds, stories, journeys, and meditations to help you sleep, relax, calm down after a busy day, or drown out distracting noises.


▪▪▪ HOW TO USE ▪▪▪

Get started by saying "Alexa, open Ambient Noise" and Alexa will ask you what sound or narration you would like to hear.

To start something immediately or to change your selection while one is playing, just say "Alexa, ask Ambient Noise to play thunderstorms" or another sound/story/journey/meditation.

For a list of available content, say "Alexa, ask Ambient Noise for a list". You can interject with your selection at any time by saying "Alexa".

Ambient Noise will play your selected sound until you say "Alexa, stop", but you can set a custom timer while a sound is playing by saying "Alexa, stop in 3 hours" or any other time duration.


▪▪▪ SOUNDS (105+) ▪▪▪

Thunderstorm, Rain, Ocean, Babbling Brook, Fireplace, Airplane, Fan, Oscillating Fan, City, Rainforest, Train, Crickets, Frogs, Bird, Clock, Cat, Vacuum, Pink Noise, Brown Noise, White Noise, Green Noise, Shushing (female), Shushing (male), Wind, Windy Leaves, Windy Trees, Rain on a Tin Roof, Rain on a Tent, Light Rain, Rain on a Window, Distant Thunderstorm, Shower, Space Deck, Hair Dryer, Clothes Dryer, Dishwasher, Wind Chimes, Whale, Windy Meadow, Heavy Rain, Dripping Water, Fountain

Full list available at https://sleepjar.com/sounds


▪▪▪ STORIES (92+) ▪▪▪

A Visit to Cozy Cove, Tanya and the Three Wishes, The Tale of Harmony and Discord, The Heavenly Artist, Anna and the Very Small Giant

Full list available at https://sleepjar.com/stories


▪▪▪ JOURNEYS (34+) ▪▪▪

Hike to a Forest Cabin, Traveling on an Alaska Snow Train, Exploring an Australian Rainforest, Driving on Route 66, Autumn on the Concord River

Full list available at https://sleepjar.com/journeys


▪▪▪ DAILY MEDITATIONS ▪▪▪

A different short meditation (~5 minutes) every day of the year, featuring relatable topics about life's common challenges.
Just say "Alexa, ask Ambient Noise for the daily meditation."


▪▪▪ GUIDED MEDITATIONS (52+) ▪▪▪

Prioritizing Yourself, Slowing Down, Building Confidence, Letting Go of Perfectionism, Nurturing Creativity

Full list available at https://sleepjar.com/meditations


⭐ PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP FEATURES ⭐

+ Access to our entire library of sounds, stories, journeys, and meditations
+ Mix 2 sounds together (over 5,000 unique combinations)
+ Mix any narration with any sound
+ Premium audio quality
+ Extended sound loops (sounds loop every 10 hours instead of every 1 hour)
+ Content Drops frequently add new choices
... and more!


✅ ACCOUNT LINKING ✅

You can now enjoy our content and features across our Alexa Skill, Sleep Jar Android app, and Sleep Jar iOS app through Account Linking! If you're a Premium member, linking your account even unlocks Premium access across devices! Just open Sleep Jar for Android or iOS, go to the settings view, and tap 'Link to Alexa' to get started.


▪▪▪ BEAUTIFUL VISUALS ▪▪▪

Enjoy exclusive animations, a persistent clock, and rich media controls while listening to Ambient Noise on compatible screen-equipped devices. Turn off visuals and put Ambient Noise into the background to control smart home devices while Ambient Noise is playing audio by saying "Alexa, ask Ambient Noise to turn on Background Mode". You can turn visuals back on at anytime by saying "Alexa, ask Ambient Noise to turn off Background Mode".


❤️ SUPPORT ❤️

Please consider showing your support by writing a review for Ambient Noise, or send us an email with your feedback at support@sleepjar.com.
